Title: Equals
Director: Mladen Djordjevic, Dejan Karaklajic, Darko Lungulov, Milos Petricic, Igor Stoimenov, Ivica Vidanovic
Actors: Danijela 'Nela' Mihajlovic, Marko Nikolic, Natasa Aksentijevic, Mariana Arandjelovic
Plot: An omnibus film on children's rights and the problems that the youngest members of our society have to face. Each story tackles a specific theme and has its own hero.
